stopFederate

public boolean stopFederate(FederateProcessHandle handle)

cancelAll

public void cancelAll()
This methods stops (i.e. kills) all federate process that have been started from this model manager. It also stops other tasks that are used by the application. In short, this methods does everything it can to stop all processes created by this application.

The method synchronous (blocking).

isFederateRunning

public boolean isFederateRunning(java.lang.String federateId,
                                 java.lang.String federateVersion)
Checks whether the federate with the given id and version is currently running. This method is not synchronized. Thus, the result might not be accurate in every case, but should be enough to display the status, for example.

Parameters:
federateId - the id of the federate.
federateVersion - the version of the federate.
Returns:
True, if the federate is running, false otherwise.
